description: Extremely reliable, I can't think of any bugs I've found in this app. I use it mainly for monitoring process memory and CPU consumption, but it can do much more. And it's got a nice modern design. Five stars.
I think it is very good!

I tried four other Process Manager GUI apps. Nothing would even launch. The "System Monitor" that comes with Ubuntu, I launched it (immediately upon startup), long pause, then nothing. Ditto for three other apps I tried. This was the only Process Manager that actually worked. Launch it and the GUI comes up with a list of running processes (with tabs for Resources and File Systems/Drives.)

Ran Ubuntu for a few years. Never had a single problem with Gnome System Monitor. Always seemed to give reliable information. Only thing I would love to be included in this app as CPU temperature. 
I noticed that at start up I got a message that one of the CPU's was running at a high temp and would have to be 'wound down in performance' . Well, it would be great if I could get that sort of information from my 'System Monitor'. Afterall, temperature is one of the systems most important parameters. 

I have tried the System Monitor on KDE Neon, and found it lacked total data up and down in the Network History! Also, I found too many CPU %usage  "UNKNOWN" in the Neon SysMon. Something I have never seen in the Gnome app. SO Gnome System Monitor gets 9/10 from me!
Me gusta estar informado de los consumos de mi equipo, y asì darme cuenta graficamente de posibles errores de mi parte al estar llevando al el limite el hardware...
Permite ver en forma de gráfica el uso en tiempo real de todos los hilos del procesador, así como el uso de la memoria RAM y de red. Excelente aplicación
summary: Cumple cabalmente con su función. La recomiendo

description: Ne s'ouvre pas sur mon Ubuntu 18.04.3
